android.car.test

类 CarTestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.test.CarTestManager

  • public final class CarTestManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for testing only. Allows mocking vehicle hal.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 android.car.CarManagerBase

        mCar

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • stopCarService

        public void stopCarService(IBinder token)
        Releases all car services. This make sense for test purpose when it is necessary to reduce interference between testing and real instances of Car Service. For example changing audio focus in CarAudioService may affect framework's AudioManager listeners. AudioManager has a lot of complex logic which is hard to mock.

      • startCarService

        public void startCarService(IBinder token)
        Re-initializes previously released car service.
        另请参阅:
        #stopCarService(IBinder)}

      • dumpVhal

        public java.lang.String dumpVhal(java.util.List<java.lang.String> options,
                                 long waitTimeoutMs)
        Dumps VHAL information or debug VHAL. waitTimeoutMs specifies the longest time CarTestService will wait to receive all dumped information from VHAL before timeout. A correctly implemented VHAL should finish dumping all the info before returning. As a result, waitTimeoutMs is used to regulate how long CarTestService would wait before it determines that VHAL is dead or stuck and returns error.

      • hasAidlVhal

        public boolean hasAidlVhal()
                    throws RemoteException
        Returns whether AIDL VHAL is used for VHAL backend.
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • getOemServiceName

        public java.lang.String getOemServiceName()
                                   throws RemoteException
        Returns OEM service name.
        抛出:
        RemoteException
